summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3887 for the improvement of alley in Block 31, Mt. Baker Park Addition being alley between 36th Avenue South and 37th Place, from Hanford Street to Mt. Rainier Drive, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47430, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
